# Upgrade Exterior Drainage System, Onion Lake, SK

**Project Title:** Upgrad Exterior Drainage System for Basement Foundations
**Reference Number:** cb-263-59726294
**Amendment Number:** 2

## Tender Details
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Procurement Status:** Expired (Finished Closing Date: May 9, 2024, 16:00:00)

**Contracting Entity:**
* **Name:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
* **Address:** 5600 11th Ave, Regina, SK S4P 3J7, Canada

## Project Description
This project involves the upgrade of the exterior drainage system for the basement foundations of a residence at Onion Lake, Saskatchewan. Key tasks include:

* Conduct a site start-up meeting with all stakeholders
* Remove exterior structures limiting access to the foundation area
* Locate and mark underground utilities before digging
* Remove existing gravel, weeping tile, and other materials
* Clean and prepare the exterior wall foundation
* Apply a waterproofing membrane
* Install a new weeping tile system
* Backfill and compact the material
* Inspect and approve the finished work

## Submittal Information
* **Closing Date:** May 9, 2024, 16:00:00 (Central Standard Time)
* **Contract Dates:** The contractor must complete the work by March 15, 2025
* **Security Requirements:** This project involves security requirements, which will be stated upon request.
* **Language:** Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada

* **Fax:** 306-780-5232

* Foundation or slab work (UISC 72.010.704)

* Single family dwelling construction services (UISC 72.110.100)

## Facility or Site Information

* The site is owned by the RCMP
